long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Commerce Command is the premier product inventory tracking system. Optimize your business with AI.

 - Create products and track your commerce by product names, skus, images and inventory levels.  
- View low stock products. Analyze inventory with AI and set Re-Stock Notifications.
- Effortlessly search your product catalog with InventoryAI's search functionality.  Easily view and track product skus with low inventory levels to optimize your business. Sign up via email for a free five day trial and extend access with subscription. 
-  Easy integration with other commerce systems including Shopify! Simply Import and Export your data utilizing CSV files. Simple to backup data with the export button.
- Easily Transform Data with AI. Enter your AI API key and chat with AI to transform your data for import.
- Utilize AI Prompts for data analysis
- Generate product descriptions with AI
- Tag Products as Discounts to Analyze your store, cart, and product Discounts
- Analytics: Have conversations with AI to analyze your commerce data
- Bring Artificial Intelligence to your Business
- Perfect for individual users and businesses of all sizes. Great for E-commerce business, E-commerce Developers, Stores, Warehouses, Construction, Restaurants, Households and more! 
- This AI Commerce Command Center cuts costs and saves your business money. Track your product catalog today with Commerce Command.
